mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS "name", m.id AS "id", m.dept_code AS "dept_code", TO_CHAR(a.created_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "created_time" FROM admin a LEFT JOIN member m ON a.id = m.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin (seq, id, type, created_time) VALUES (admin_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, 'admin', sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from admin where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update auth set name=#{name} where id=#{id}
